errorNotPlayer: You must be a player to use the [commandName] command!
errorNoSubcommandProvided:
You must specify which subcommand you want to use!

For help, try: /nation help
errorBadSubcommand:
I could not find that subcommand!
For help, try: /nation help
errorCanNotRunOnYourself: You can not run this command on yourself.
errorNationBadPermissions: You must be at least a [minimumRole] to execute that command.
errorNationNotInNation: You must be in a nation to execute that command.
errorNationNoPlayerFound: No user found with the name [playerName]!
errorNationCreateNoNameProvided:
You must provide a name for your nation.
Format: /nation create [name]
Example: /nation create My Cool Nation
errorNationCreateAlreadyInNation: You must leave your current nation before creating a new one!
nationInviteInvited: You have been invited to join [nationName] by [inviterName]!
errorNationInviteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To invite a user to your nation please specify their name!
Format: /nation invite [username]
Example: /nation invite connor7000
errorNationJoinManual: This is an automated command, ask someone to invite you, then click on the accept button.
errorNationJoinExpired: This invitation has expired; ask for a new one!
errorNationJoinAlreadyInNation: You are already in a nation.
errorNationLeaveIsChancellor:
You may not leave a nation which you are the chancellor of.
You may either appoint a new chancellor with: /nation appoint [name].
Or you may disband your nation with: /nation disband
errorNationPromoteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To promote a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation promote [username]
Example: /nation promote connor7000
errorNationDemoteBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To demote a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation demote [username]
Example: /nation demote connor7000
errorNationKickBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To kick a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation kick [username]
Example: /nation kick connor7000
errorNationAppointBadUsername:
Bad username provided.
To appoint a user please specify their name!
Format: /nation appoint [username]
Example: /nation appoint connor7000
nationPower:
&nYour Nation Power&r: [nationPower]/[maxNationPower]
Member: [memberPower]/[maxMemberPower]
Rift: [riftPower]/[maxRiftPower]
&nYour Power&r: [playerPower]/[maxPlayerPower]
Passive: [playerPassivePower]/[maxPlayerPassivePower]
Bonus: [playerBonusPower]/[maxPlayerBonusPower]
nationPassivePowerIncremented:
Your passive power just got increased to [passivePower]/[maxPassivePower]!
Your overall power is now [totalPower]/[maxTotalPower].
nationStatus:
&nNation Power&r: [nationPower]
Nation Claim Threshold: [nationClaimThreshold]
Nation Existence Threshold: [nationExistenceThreshold]
Chunks: [nationChunkCount]/[nationChunkMax]
Outposts: [nationOutpostCount]/[nationOutpostMax]
Protection: [status][nationProtectionDuration]
blockHomeLore:
Where you place this block
will become your nation's home.
blockOutpostLore:
Where you place this block
will become one of your
nation's outposts.
giveBlock:
You have been given a [blockName]&r!
Where you place this block will become your nation's home/outpost.
If you lose this block, you can get another with /nation claim [home] [outpost]
errorGiveBlockInventoryFull:
Your inventory is full, so you did not get a [blockName]&r.
You can claim another with /nation claim [home] [outpost]
errorGiveBlockAlreadyOwned: You already have a [blockName] in your inventory.
removeBlock:
Removed your [blockName].
You can claim another with /nation claim [home] [outpost]
errorNationClaimHomeClaimed: You have already claimed your home.
chunkClaimRift:
Claimed [riftChunks] rift chunks adding [riftPower] power!
Now using [chunksClaimed]/[chunksClaimable] claims.
errorChunkClaimAlreadyOwned: This chunk is being defended by [defendingNationName] and is not currently overclaimable.
errorChunkClaimAlreadyOwnedByYou: Your nation already owns this chunk.
errorChunkClaimAlreadyOwnedClaim: This chunk is a home/outpost chunk being defended by [defendingNationName] and is not currently overclaimable.
errorChunkClaimNoNeighbour: This chunk is not connected to any of your existing claims.
errorChunkClaimNoClaimsRift:
Claiming this rift would require [riftChunks] claims.
You are already using [chunksClaimed]/[chunksClaimable] claims.
errorChunkUnclaimHome: You can not unclaim your home chunk.
errorChunkUnclaimNotClaimed: Your nation doesn't own this chunk.
errorChunkUnclaimMultipleUnclaimed:
Unclaiming this chunk would unclaim [chunkCount] chunks.
To continue, use: /nation unclaim force
blockProtectedClaim: You can not break claim blocks.
errorClaimSpecialOnRift: You may not claim home/outpost on a rift.
claimOutpost:
Claimed outpost!
You have now claimed [outpostsClaimed]/[outpostsCap] outposts.
errorClaimOutpostNoHome: You must claim a home first.
overclaimStart:
Started overclaiming one of [defendingNationName]'s chunks.
Stay in this chunk for [duration] without taking damage.
overclaimSuccessBroadcast:
[attackingNationName] has overclaimed one of [defendingNationName]'s chunks!
[defendingNationName] lost [chunkCount] chunks.
overclaimFailMoved: Overclaim failed, you can not move out of the chunk.
overclaimFailDamaged: Overclaim failed, you can not take damage.
